title: Course of Action Analysis for Bridge Seizure
description: A mission planner must develop and compare two courses of action (COA) for seizing a critical bridge: an air assault and a ground assault.

tasks.description: Develop the key elements of both the air assault COA and the ground assault COA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates two distinct, viable plans with objectives and timelines.

tasks.description: Run simulations (wargames) for both COAs against known enemy dispositions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully executes simulations for both plans.

tasks.description: Analyze simulation results to compare projected casualties, probability of success, and resource expenditure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner correctly analyzes the trade-offs of each COA.

tasks.description: Recommend the preferred COA with a detailed justification based on the analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner produces a clear recommendation supported by the simulation data.
